text: Joni Kay Ernst (n√©e Culver; born July 1, 1970) is an American politician. She has been Iowa's U.S. Senator since 2015. She is a Republican. Prior to being a U.S. Senator, she was an Iowa state senator. On November 4, 2014, she was elected to the United States Senate. Ernst is the first woman to represent Iowa in the United States Congress. Ernst was born in Red Oak, Iowa. ==References== Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:United States senators from Iowa Category:State legislators of the United States Category:American Lutherans Category:1970 births Category:Living people
title: Joni Ernst
